name: @microtsm/cli
description: CLI tool to simplify Vite + Vue + Single-SPA development

scripts.mfe.build: nodemon --exec "wait-on dist/bin/cli.js && pnpm --filter vue-mfe-app run build"
scripts.mfe.dev: nodemon --exec "wait-on dist/bin/cli.js && pnpm --filter vue-mfe-app run dev"
scripts.mfe.serve.https: nodemon --exec "wait-on dist/bin/cli.js &&  pnpm --filter vue-mfe-app run serve.https"
scripts.dev.cli.build: pnpm clean && concurrently --colors -n CLI,MFE -c cyan,blue -k "pnpm build.watch" "pnpm mfe.build" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.dev.cli.dev: pnpm clean && concurrently --colors -n CLI,MFE -c cyan,blue -k "pnpm build.watch" "pnpm mfe.dev" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.dev.cli.serve: pnpm clean && concurrently --colors -n CLI,MFE -c cyan,blue -k "pnpm build.watch" "pnpm mfe.serve.https" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.release:patch: pnpm build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
